residency_permits.description: Residency permits in Portugal provide a pathway to a new life in one of Europe's most desirable destinations. Whether through investment, employment, or family ties, Portugal offers a range of options for individuals seeking to establish residency in this beautiful country. With its welcoming atmosphere, rich culture, and stunning landscapes, Portugal truly is a gateway to European living. Obtaining residency in Portugal comes with a host of benefits. Beyond the opportunity to live in a safe and welcoming country with a high standard of living, residents also have access to Portugal's excellent healthcare and education systems. Additionally, residency in Portugal grants access to the wider Schengen Area, allowing for visa-free travel throughout much of Europe.
options: Digital Nomad Visa – You get your Visa by Working remotely or running a business
D2 Visa – Freelancer/Independent services providers Visa
